sentences: Lisaks eelistatud toodetele saavad kliendid ka sooduspuhastusteenuse.
Mees võttis lisaks oma sõbra nõuandeid.
Töölise palk on 1200 eurot kuus lisaks kõik maksud ja lisaüleminekud.
context: The Estonian word 'lisaks' is used as an adverb or preposition to indicate adding something extra. It can be translated to English as 'in addition', 'besides', or 'also'. The word appears before the additional information being referenced. In some contexts, it may function similarly to 'furthermore' in formal writing.
